launcher.title: Launchpad
launcher.empty: No connections available. Add a connection to get started.
launcher.noWsl: No WSL distributions available. Make sure WSL is installed.
launcher.consentDescription: The launcher scans installed applications on your Mac and caches their icons locally for quick browsing.
launcher.consentScan: Scans /Applications and other directories for installed .app bundles
launcher.consentCache: Caches app icons as PNG files in the application data directory:
launcher.consentPrivacy: All data stays local — nothing is sent to any server
launcher.disableConfirm: This will clear all cached icons and disable the launcher. You can re-enable it anytime.
